body:
Well. 100 Subscribers. Almost 100 videos of loud dubstep, UHC, PvP and monument mining. Ok, but really I want to thank you all who have watched my videos and just supported me throughout this journey, I suggest watching the full video to get the full feeling. I tried my best to incorporate all my best clips I have used on Avicus and most of the key songs I have used. I really hope you enjoy the video, it is long and I put 6+ hours into it. I hope if any new people watch me, they subscribe and can be part of my road to, lets say, 200? ;)


People to thank:
  • JustBudah
  • ImRaging
  • Pizza334
  • Rest Of The Game Changers
  • Galrandir
  • Kickarse10
  • Tynvale
  • And every one of my subscribers.

Many, Many, Many Many Many thanks,

Lego! ;)

Video: http://youtu.be/lFZB_7PX-6c

(Video is uploading so will probably not work for a few minutes after this post)

title: Flaming Skull's 100 Subscriber Special

replies.body: According to the thingy I was you're 100th sub :} Congrats man!
replies.body_tagged: According to the thingy I was you're 100th sub :} Congrats man!

replies.body:
Ayy, Gratz!

To give you a little gift, I had this really old C4D file. (Idk if it's even a template). But I restored it and I hope you enjoy! :) <3

https://youtu.be/X-H-gQJT7MI // https://www.mediafire.com/?mgt17yybrkutqdf
